name: Lord of the Rings
description: It centers around an all powerful ring forged by the Dark Lord Sauron.

name: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
description: Harry Potter, an eleven-year-old orphan, discovers that he is a wizard and is invited to study at Hogwarts.

name: Pinocchio
description: This tale follows a marionette boy, Pinocchio, crafted out of a talking log by the poor woodcarver, Gepetto.

name: The Lion, the Witch, and the Wardrobe
description: The story unfolds when the four Pevensie children are evacuated from England.

name: Catcher in the Rye
description: This novel, narrated by the iconic 16-year-old Holden Caulfield, is a staple in more than just tenth grade English classrooms across America.

name: Twenty Thousand Leagues Under the Sea
description: In the freedom of the ocean, Aronnax and the others see beauties of the sea that they never could have fathomed.
